doc:
Bernard Campan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernard_Campan 0 Bernard Campan (born 4 April 1958) is a French actor, film director and writer. He is a member of Les Inconnus trio of humorists. He won a César Award for Best Debut for Les Trois Frères, and was nominated for best actor for his role in Se souvenir des belles choses. Bernard_Campan ( born 4_April_1958 ) is a_French_actor , film_director_and_writer . He is a_member of Les_Inconnus_trio of humorists . He won a_César_Award for_Best_Debut for Les_Trois_Frères , and was_nominated for best_actor for his_role in Se_souvenir_des_belles_choses .
